1â†’# Tasks: Interpreter Bootstrap Strategy
     2â†’
     3â†’**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/044-interpreter-bootstrap/`
     4â†’**Prerequisites**: plan.md, spec.md, research.md, data-model.md, contracts/
     5â†’**TDD Mandated**: Yes (Constitution Principle VII)
     6â†’
     7â†’**Organization**: Tasks are grouped by user story to enable independent implementation and testing.
     8â†’
     9â†’## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`
    10â†’
    11â†’- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
    12â†’- **[Story]**: Which user story this task belongs to (US1, US2, US3, US4, US5)
    13â†’- Include exact file paths in descriptions
    14â†’
    15â†’## Path Conventions
    16â†’
    17â†’- **Source**: `src/clysm/` (Common Lisp ASDF system)
    18â†’- **Tests**: `tests/unit/`, `tests/contract/`, `tests/integration/`
    19â†’
    20â†’---
    21â†’
    22â†’## Phase 1: Setup (Shared Infrastructure)
    23â†’
    24â†’**Purpose**: Project structure and package definitions for interpreter extensions
    25â†’
    26â†’- [ ] T001 Create bootstrap package definition in src/clysm/bootstrap/package.lisp
    27â†’- [ ] T002 [P] Create interpreter-macros package definition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp (package form only)
    28â†’- [ ] T003 [P] Create interpreter-builtins package definition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp (package form only)
    29â†’- [ ] T004 [P] Create interpreter-file package definition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp (package form only)
    30â†’- [ ] T005 Update clysm.asd to include new modules with correct dependency order
    31â†’- [ ] T006 Create tests/unit/interpreter/ directory structure
    32â†’
    33â†’---
    34â†’
    35â†’## Phase 2: Foundational (Blocking Prerequisites)
    36â†’
    37â†’**Purpose**: Core data structures and registries that ALL user stories depend on
    38â†’
    39â†’**CRITICAL**: No user story work can begin until this phase is complete
    40â†’
    41â†’### Core Data Structures
    42â†’
    43â†’- [ ] T007 Add *macro-registry* global hash-table in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    44â†’- [ ] T008 [P] Add *struct-registry* global hash-table in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    45â†’- [ ] T009 [P] Add *special-variables* global hash-table in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    46â†’- [ ] T010 Define macro-expander struct (name, lambda-list, body, env, whole-var, env-var) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
    47â†’- [ ] T011 [P] Define lambda-list-info struct (required, optional, rest, keys, allow-other-keys, aux) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    48â†’- [ ] T012 [P] Define interpreter-struct-type struct (name, slots, constructor, copier, predicate, include) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    49â†’- [ ] T013 [P] Define interpreter-struct-instance struct (type, slots) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    50â†’
    51â†’### Lambda-List Parsing (Required for defun/defmacro)
    52â†’
    53â†’- [ ] T014 Implement parse-lambda-list function (handles &optional, &rest, &key, &aux, supplied-p) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    54â†’- [ ] T015 Implement bind-lambda-list-args function (binds arguments per parsed lambda-list) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    55â†’
    56â†’### Error Conditions
    57â†’
    58â†’- [ ] T016 Define interpreter-error condition class in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    59â†’- [ ] T017 [P] Define unbound-variable-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    60â†’- [ ] T018 [P] Define undefined-function-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    61â†’- [ ] T019 [P] Define unsupported-feature-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    62â†’- [ ] T020 [P] Define macro-expansion-depth-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    63â†’
    64â†’**Checkpoint**: Foundation ready - user story implementation can now begin
    65â†’
    66â†’---
    67â†’
    68â†’## Phase 3: User Story 4 - Support All Compiler-Required Special Forms (Priority: P1) ğŸ¯ MVP
    69â†’
    70â†’**Goal**: Implement all special forms and macros from blessed subset needed by compiler source
    71â†’
    72â†’**Independent Test**: Interpret each special form in isolation and verify correct behavior
    73â†’
    74â†’**Note**: US4 is implemented first because US1 (Run Compiler Source) depends on having these features available
    75â†’
    76â†’### Tests for User Story 4 (TDD Required)
    77â†’
    78â†’- [ ] T021 [P] [US4] Write defun-test.lisp with tests for full lambda-list in tests/unit/interpreter/defun-test.lisp
    79â†’- [ ] T022 [P] [US4] Write defmacro-test.lisp with tests for &whole, &environment, &body in tests/unit/interpreter/defmacro-test.lisp
    80â†’- [ ] T023 [P] [US4] Write defstruct-test.lisp with tests for slots, constructor, accessors in tests/unit/interpreter/defstruct-test.lisp
    81â†’- [ ] T024 [P] [US4] Write loop-test.lisp with tests for for/collect/do/when/while in tests/unit/interpreter/loop-test.lisp
    82â†’- [ ] T025 [P] [US4] Write handler-case-test.lisp with tests for condition handling in tests/unit/interpreter/handler-case-test.lisp
    83â†’- [ ] T026 [P] [US4] Write builtins-test.lisp with tests for 50+ core functions in tests/unit/interpreter/builtins-test.lisp
    84â†’- [ ] T027 [P] [US4] Write special-forms-test.lisp for cond/case/typecase/unwind-protect in tests/unit/interpreter/special-forms-test.lisp
    85â†’- [ ] T028 [P] [US4] Write multiple-values-test.lisp for mvb/values in tests/unit/interpreter/multiple-values-test.lisp
    86â†’
    87â†’### Implementation: Definition Forms (FR-001 through FR-004)
    88â†’
    89â†’- [ ] T029 [US4] Implement interpret-defun with full lambda-list support in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    90â†’- [ ] T030 [US4] Implement interpret-defmacro with &whole/&environment/&body in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
    91â†’- [ ] T031 [US4] Implement interpret-defvar in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    92â†’- [ ] T032 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-defparameter in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    93â†’- [ ] T033 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-defconstant in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    94â†’- [ ] T034 [US4] Implement interpret-defstruct with slot options in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    95â†’
    96â†’### Implementation: Control Flow Forms (FR-005 through FR-008)
    97â†’
    98â†’- [ ] T035 [US4] Implement interpret-cond with arbitrary clauses in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
    99â†’- [ ] T036 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-case with key matching in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   100â†’- [ ] T037 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-ecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   101â†’- [ ] T038 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-typecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   102â†’- [ ] T039 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-etypecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   103â†’- [ ] T040 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-ctypecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   104â†’- [ ] T041 [US4] Implement expand-loop macro to TAGBODY/GO in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   105â†’
   106â†’### Implementation: Condition System (FR-009 through FR-012)
   107â†’
   108â†’- [ ] T042 [US4] Implement interpret-handler-case via host delegation in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   109â†’- [ ] T043 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-handler-bind in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   110â†’- [ ] T044 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-restart-case in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   111â†’- [ ] T045 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-restart-bind in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   112â†’- [ ] T046 [US4] Implement interpret-unwind-protect with cleanup in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   113â†’- [ ] T047 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-catch in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   114â†’- [ ] T048 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-throw in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   115â†’
   116â†’### Implementation: Multiple Values (FR-011)
   117â†’
   118â†’- [ ] T049 [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-bind in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   119â†’- [ ] T050 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-list in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   120â†’- [ ] T051 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-call in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   121â†’- [ ] T052 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-prog1 in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   122â†’- [ ] T053 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-values in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   123â†’- [ ] T054 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-values-list in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   124â†’
   125â†’### Implementation: Other Forms (FR-013 through FR-015)
   126â†’
   127â†’- [ ] T055 [US4] Implement interpret-the (type declaration ignored) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   128â†’- [ ] T056 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-locally with declare filtering in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   129â†’- [ ] T057 [US4] Implement interpret-eval-when for :execute situations in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   130â†’- [ ] T058 [US4] Implement interpret-in-package for package switching in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
   131â†’
   132â†’### Implementation: Macro System (FR-016 through FR-019)
   133â†’
   134â†’- [ ] T059 [US4] Implement maybe-macroexpand with depth limit in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   135â†’- [ ] T060 [US4] Implement apply-macro-expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   136â†’- [ ] T061 [US4] Implement interpreter-macroexpand-1 API in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   137â†’- [ ] T062 [US4] Implement interpreter-macroexpand API in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   138â†’- [ ] T063 [US4] Implement interpreter-macro-function getter/setter in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   139â†’- [ ] T064 [US4] Implement parse-macro-lambda-list for &whole/&environment in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   140â†’
   141â†’### Implementation: Built-in Functions (FR-020 through FR-023)
   142â†’
   143â†’- [ ] T065 [US4] Add hash-table functions to install-builtins in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
   144â†’- [ ] T066 [P] [US4] Add sequence functions (mapcar, reduce, find, position, remove) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
   145â†’- [ ] T067 [P] [US4] Add string functions (string=, upcase, downcase, concatenate) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
   146â†’- [ ] T068 [P] [US4] Add numeric functions (floor, ceiling, truncate, round, mod, rem) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
   147â†’- [ ] T069 [P] [US4] Add type functions (typep, type-of, coerce) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
   148â†’- [ ] T070 [P] [US4] Add condition functions (error, warn, signal) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
   149â†’- [ ] T071 [US4] Add remaining 50+ blessed functions in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
   150â†’
   151â†’### Implementation: Standard Macro Expanders
   152â†’
   153â†’- [ ] T072 [US4] Register when/unless macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   154â†’- [ ] T073 [P] [US4] Register and/or macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   155â†’- [ ] T074 [P] [US4] Register push/pop/incf/decf macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   156â†’- [ ] T075 [P] [US4] Register prog1/progn macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   157â†’- [ ] T076 [P] [US4] Register dolist/do macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   158â†’- [ ] T077 [P] [US4] Register destructuring-bind macro expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   159â†’- [ ] T078 [P] [US4] Register setf macro expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   160â†’- [ ] T079 [P] [US4] Register with-open-file macro expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
   161â†’
   162â†’**Checkpoint**: All special forms and macros available - US1 can now proceed
   163â†’
   164â†’---
   165â†’
   166â†’## Phase 4: User Story 1 - Run Compiler Source on Interpreter (Priority: P1)
   167â†’
   168â†’**Goal**: Execute all 45 compiler modules via interpreter without errors
   169â†’
   170â†’**Independent Test**: Load all modules via interpret-file and call compile-to-wasm on test expressions
   171â†’
   172â†’### Tests for User Story 1 (TDD Required)
   173â†’
   174â†’- [ ] T080 [P] [US1] Write file-loading-test.lisp in tests/unit/interpreter/file-loading-test.lisp
   175â†’- [ ] T081 [P] [US1] Write compile-from-interpreter-test.lisp in tests/contract/interpreter-compile-test.lisp
   176â†’
   177â†’### Implementation: File Loading (FR-024 through FR-027)
   178â†’
   179â†’- [ ] T082 [US1] Implement interpret-file function in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
   180â†’- [ ] T083 [US1] Implement filter-declare-forms helper in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
   181â†’- [ ] T084 [US1] Implement with-open-file interpretation support in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
   182â†’- [ ] T085 [US1] Implement package switching during file loading in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
   183â†’
   184â†’### Integration: Load Compiler Modules
   185â†’
   186â†’- [ ] T086 [US1] Create load-compiler-modules function per *compilation-order* in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
   187â†’- [ ] T087 [US1] Test loading backend modules (leb128, sections, wasm-emit) via interpreter in tests/integration/interpreter-backend-test.lisp
   188â†’- [ ] T088 [US1] Test loading compiler modules (ast, env, codegen) via interpreter in tests/integration/interpreter-compiler-test.lisp
   189â†’- [ ] T089 [US1] Test calling compile-to-wasm after interpreter load in tests/integration/interpreter-full-load-test.lisp
   190â†’
   191â†’**Checkpoint**: Compiler source runs on interpreter - US2 can now proceed
   192â†’
   193â†’---
   194â†’
   195â†’## Phase 5: User Story 2 - Generate Stage 0 Binary via Interpreter (Priority: P2)
   196â†’
   197â†’**Goal**: Generate valid Stage 0 Wasm binary entirely via interpreter evaluation
   198â†’
   199â†’**Independent Test**: Run generate-stage0-via-interpreter and validate output with wasm-tools
   200â†’
   201â†’### Tests for User Story 2 (TDD Required)
   202â†’
   203â†’- [ ] T090 [P] [US2] Write stage0-generation-test.lisp in tests/contract/interpreter-stage0-test.lisp
   204â†’- [ ] T091 [P] [US2] Write stage0-validation-test.lisp in tests/integration/stage0-wasm-valid-test.lisp
   205â†’
   206â†’### Implementation: Bootstrap Infrastructure (FR-028 through FR-031)
   207â†’
   208â†’- [ ] T092 [US2] Define bootstrap-result struct in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
   209â†’- [ ] T093 [US2] Implement form-compilable-p predicate in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
   210â†’- [ ] T094 [US2] Implement compile-single-form wrapper in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
   211â†’- [ ] T095 [US2] Implement accumulate-wasm-bytes combiner in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
   212â†’- [ ] T096 [US2] Implement generate-stage0-via-interpreter main function in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
   213â†’- [ ] T097 [US2] Add progress tracking with module/form counts in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
   214â†’- [ ] T098 [US2] Add wasm-tools validate integration in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
   215â†’
   216â†’### Scripts and CLI
   217â†’
   218â†’- [ ] T099 [US2] Create build/bootstrap-interp.lisp CLI entry point
   219â†’- [ ] T100 [US2] Create scripts/gen-stage0-interp.sh shell wrapper
   220â†’
   221â†’**Checkpoint**: Stage 0 generated via interpreter - US3 can now proceed
   222â†’
   223â†’---
   224â†’
   225â†’## Phase 6: User Story 3 - Achieve Fixed-Point Verification (Priority: P3)
   226â†’
   227â†’**Goal**: Verify Stage 1 == Stage 2 byte-for-byte (proof of self-hosting)
   228â†’
   229â†’**Independent Test**: Run verify-fixpoint.sh and check exit code 0
   230â†’
   231â†’### Tests for User Story 3 (TDD Required)
   232â†’
   233â†’- [ ] T101 [P] [US3] Write fixpoint-verification-test.lisp in tests/integration/bootstrap-fixpoint-test.lisp
   234â†’
   235â†’### Implementation: Fixed-Point Infrastructure (FR-032 through FR-035)
   236â†’
   237â†’- [ ] T102 [US3] Implement verify-fixpoint function in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp
   238â†’- [ ] T103 [US3] Implement run-full-bootstrap (Stage 0 â†’ 1 â†’ 2) in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp
   239â†’- [ ] T104 [US3] Implement generate-json-report for CI in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp
   240â†’- [ ] T105 [US3] Define fixpoint-status type with exit codes in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp
   241â†’
   242â†’### Scripts and CLI
   243â†’
   244â†’- [ ] T106 [US3] Create scripts/verify-fixpoint-interp.sh with exit codes
   245â†’- [ ] T107 [US3] Create build/fixpoint-check.lisp CLI entry point
   246â†’- [ ] T108 [US3] Integrate with existing scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh
   247â†’
   248â†’**Checkpoint**: Fixed-point achieved - self-hosting proven
   249â†’
   250â†’---
   251â†’
   252â†’## Phase 7: User Story 5 - SBCL-Free Development Workflow (Priority: P4)
   253â†’
   254â†’**Goal**: Complete development cycle without SBCL dependency
   255â†’
   256â†’**Independent Test**: Run bootstrap-without-sbcl.sh and verify full cycle completes
   257â†’
   258â†’### Tests for User Story 5 (TDD Required)
   259â†’
   260â†’- [ ] T109 [P] [US5] Write sbcl-free-workflow-test.lisp in tests/integration/sbcl-free-test.lisp
   261â†’
   262â†’### Implementation: Workflow Scripts
   263â†’
   264â†’- [ ] T110 [US5] Create scripts/bootstrap-without-sbcl.sh that uses only wasmtime
   265â†’- [ ] T111 [US5] Update host-shim/stage1-host.js to support interpreter-generated Stage 0
   266â†’- [ ] T112 [US5] Create scripts/run-tests-via-interpreter.sh
   267â†’- [ ] T113 [US5] Document SBCL-free workflow in docs/interpreter-bootstrap.md
   268â†’
   269â†’**Checkpoint**: SBCL-free development possible
   270â†’
   271â†’---
   272â†’
   273â†’## Phase 8: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns
   274â†’
   275â†’**Purpose**: Improvements that affect multiple user stories
   276â†’
   277â†’- [ ] T114 [P] Update CLAUDE.md with interpreter bootstrap documentation
   278â†’- [ ] T115 [P] Add interpreter tests to nix flake check
   279â†’- [ ] T116 Code cleanup: Remove redundant host-CL delegations where possible
   280â†’- [ ] T117 [P] Performance profiling: Ensure Stage 0 gen < 5 minutes
   281â†’- [ ] T118 [P] Add interpreter-specific error messages with form context
   282â†’- [ ] T119 Run quickstart.md validation end-to-end
   283â†’- [ ] T120 Update specs/044-interpreter-bootstrap/checklists/requirements.md as complete
   284â†’
   285â†’---
   286â†’
   287â†’## Dependencies & Execution Order
   288â†’
   289â†’### Phase Dependencies
   290â†’
   291â†’```
   292â†’Phase 1 (Setup)
   293â†’    â†“
   294â†’Phase 2 (Foundational) â† BLOCKS ALL USER STORIES
   295â†’    â†“
   296â†’Phase 3 (US4: Special Forms) â† BLOCKS US1
   297â†’    â†“
   298â†’Phase 4 (US1: Run Compiler) â† BLOCKS US2
   299â†’    â†“
   300â†’Phase 5 (US2: Stage 0 Gen) â† BLOCKS US3
   301â†’    â†“
   302â†’Phase 6 (US3: Fixed-Point)
   303â†’    â†“
   304â†’Phase 7 (US5: SBCL-Free) [Can run parallel with US3]
   305â†’    â†“
   306â†’Phase 8 (Polish)
   307â†’```
   308â†’
   309â†’### User Story Dependencies
   310â†’
   311â†’- **US4 (P1)**: Must complete FIRST - provides all required special forms
   312â†’- **US1 (P1)**: Depends on US4 - cannot load compiler without special forms
   313â†’- **US2 (P2)**: Depends on US1 - cannot generate Stage 0 without loaded compiler
   314â†’- **US3 (P3)**: Depends on US2 - cannot verify fixed-point without Stage 0
   315â†’- **US5 (P4)**: Depends on US3 success - final workflow validation
   316â†’
   317â†’### Parallel Opportunities Within Phases
   318â†’
   319â†’**Phase 2 (Foundational):**
   320â†’```
   321â†’T007 (macro-registry)
   322â†’T008, T009, T011, T012, T013 (all [P] - different structs)
   323â†’T017, T018, T019, T020 (all [P] - different conditions)
   324â†’```
   325â†’
   326â†’**Phase 3 (US4):**
   327â†’```
   328â†’All test files T021-T028 are [P] - can write in parallel
   329â†’Control flow forms T036-T040 are [P] - independent implementations
   330â†’Condition forms T043-T048 are [P] - host delegation
   331â†’Multiple value forms T050-T054 are [P] - independent
   332â†’Builtin groups T065-T070 are [P] - different function categories
   333â†’Macro expanders T073-T079 are [P] - independent macros
   334â†’```
   335â†’
   336â†’---
   337â†’
   338â†’## Implementation Strategy
   339â†’
   340â†’### MVP First (User Story 4 + 1 Only)
   341â†’
   342â†’1. Complete Phase 1: Setup
   343â†’2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational (CRITICAL)
   344â†’3. Complete Phase 3: US4 (Special Forms)
   345â†’4. Complete Phase 4: US1 (Run Compiler)
   346â†’5. **STOP and VALIDATE**: All 45 modules load without error
   347â†’6. Demo: `(compile-to-wasm '(+ 1 2))` returns valid Wasm
   348â†’
   349â†’### Incremental Delivery
   350â†’
   351â†’1. US4 + US1 â†’ Compiler runs on interpreter (MVP!)
   352â†’2. Add US2 â†’ Stage 0 generation works
   353â†’3. Add US3 â†’ Self-hosting proven
   354â†’4. Add US5 â†’ Full SBCL-free workflow
   355â†’
   356â†’### Task Count Summary
   357â†’
   358â†’| Phase | Story | Task Count |
   359â†’|-------|-------|------------|
   360â†’| Setup | - | 6 |
   361â†’| Foundational | - | 14 |
   362â†’| US4: Special Forms | US4 | 59 |
   363â†’| US1: Run Compiler | US1 | 10 |
   364â†’| US2: Stage 0 Gen | US2 | 11 |
   365â†’| US3: Fixed-Point | US3 | 8 |
   366â†’| US5: SBCL-Free | US5 | 5 |

   369â†’

   371â†’

   373â†’

file.content:
# Tasks: Interpreter Bootstrap Strategy

**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/044-interpreter-bootstrap/`
**Prerequisites**: plan.md, spec.md, research.md, data-model.md, contracts/
**TDD Mandated**: Yes (Constitution Principle VII)

**Organization**: Tasks are grouped by user story to enable independent implementation and testing.

## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`

- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
- **[Story]**: Which user story this task belongs to (US1, US2, US3, US4, US5)
- Include exact file paths in descriptions

## Path Conventions

- **Source**: `src/clysm/` (Common Lisp ASDF system)
- **Tests**: `tests/unit/`, `tests/contract/`, `tests/integration/`

---

## Phase 1: Setup (Shared Infrastructure)

**Purpose**: Project structure and package definitions for interpreter extensions

- [ ] T001 Create bootstrap package definition in src/clysm/bootstrap/package.lisp
- [ ] T002 [P] Create interpreter-macros package definition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp (package form only)
- [ ] T003 [P] Create interpreter-builtins package definition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp (package form only)
- [ ] T004 [P] Create interpreter-file package definition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp (package form only)
- [ ] T005 Update clysm.asd to include new modules with correct dependency order
- [ ] T006 Create tests/unit/interpreter/ directory structure

---

## Phase 2: Foundational (Blocking Prerequisites)

**Purpose**: Core data structures and registries that ALL user stories depend on

**CRITICAL**: No user story work can begin until this phase is complete

### Core Data Structures

- [ ] T007 Add *macro-registry* global hash-table in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T008 [P] Add *struct-registry* global hash-table in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T009 [P] Add *special-variables* global hash-table in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T010 Define macro-expander struct (name, lambda-list, body, env, whole-var, env-var) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T011 [P] Define lambda-list-info struct (required, optional, rest, keys, allow-other-keys, aux) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T012 [P] Define interpreter-struct-type struct (name, slots, constructor, copier, predicate, include) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T013 [P] Define interpreter-struct-instance struct (type, slots) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp

### Lambda-List Parsing (Required for defun/defmacro)

- [ ] T014 Implement parse-lambda-list function (handles &optional, &rest, &key, &aux, supplied-p) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T015 Implement bind-lambda-list-args function (binds arguments per parsed lambda-list) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp

### Error Conditions

- [ ] T016 Define interpreter-error condition class in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T017 [P] Define unbound-variable-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T018 [P] Define undefined-function-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T019 [P] Define unsupported-feature-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T020 [P] Define macro-expansion-depth-error condition in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp

**Checkpoint**: Foundation ready - user story implementation can now begin

---

## Phase 3: User Story 4 - Support All Compiler-Required Special Forms (Priority: P1) ğŸ¯ MVP

**Goal**: Implement all special forms and macros from blessed subset needed by compiler source

**Independent Test**: Interpret each special form in isolation and verify correct behavior

**Note**: US4 is implemented first because US1 (Run Compiler Source) depends on having these features available

### Tests for User Story 4 (TDD Required)

- [ ] T021 [P] [US4] Write defun-test.lisp with tests for full lambda-list in tests/unit/interpreter/defun-test.lisp
- [ ] T022 [P] [US4] Write defmacro-test.lisp with tests for &whole, &environment, &body in tests/unit/interpreter/defmacro-test.lisp
- [ ] T023 [P] [US4] Write defstruct-test.lisp with tests for slots, constructor, accessors in tests/unit/interpreter/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T024 [P] [US4] Write loop-test.lisp with tests for for/collect/do/when/while in tests/unit/interpreter/loop-test.lisp
- [ ] T025 [P] [US4] Write handler-case-test.lisp with tests for condition handling in tests/unit/interpreter/handler-case-test.lisp
- [ ] T026 [P] [US4] Write builtins-test.lisp with tests for 50+ core functions in tests/unit/interpreter/builtins-test.lisp
- [ ] T027 [P] [US4] Write special-forms-test.lisp for cond/case/typecase/unwind-protect in tests/unit/interpreter/special-forms-test.lisp
- [ ] T028 [P] [US4] Write multiple-values-test.lisp for mvb/values in tests/unit/interpreter/multiple-values-test.lisp

### Implementation: Definition Forms (FR-001 through FR-004)

- [ ] T029 [US4] Implement interpret-defun with full lambda-list support in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T030 [US4] Implement interpret-defmacro with &whole/&environment/&body in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T031 [US4] Implement interpret-defvar in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T032 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-defparameter in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T033 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-defconstant in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T034 [US4] Implement interpret-defstruct with slot options in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp

### Implementation: Control Flow Forms (FR-005 through FR-008)

- [ ] T035 [US4] Implement interpret-cond with arbitrary clauses in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T036 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-case with key matching in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T037 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-ecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T038 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-typecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T039 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-etypecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T040 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-ctypecase in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T041 [US4] Implement expand-loop macro to TAGBODY/GO in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp

### Implementation: Condition System (FR-009 through FR-012)

- [ ] T042 [US4] Implement interpret-handler-case via host delegation in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T043 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-handler-bind in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T044 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-restart-case in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T045 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-restart-bind in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T046 [US4] Implement interpret-unwind-protect with cleanup in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T047 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-catch in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T048 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-throw in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp

### Implementation: Multiple Values (FR-011)

- [ ] T049 [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-bind in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T050 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-list in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T051 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-call in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T052 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-multiple-value-prog1 in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T053 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-values in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T054 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-values-list in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp

### Implementation: Other Forms (FR-013 through FR-015)

- [ ] T055 [US4] Implement interpret-the (type declaration ignored) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T056 [P] [US4] Implement interpret-locally with declare filtering in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T057 [US4] Implement interpret-eval-when for :execute situations in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp
- [ ] T058 [US4] Implement interpret-in-package for package switching in src/clysm/eval/interpreter.lisp

### Implementation: Macro System (FR-016 through FR-019)

- [ ] T059 [US4] Implement maybe-macroexpand with depth limit in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T060 [US4] Implement apply-macro-expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T061 [US4] Implement interpreter-macroexpand-1 API in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T062 [US4] Implement interpreter-macroexpand API in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T063 [US4] Implement interpreter-macro-function getter/setter in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T064 [US4] Implement parse-macro-lambda-list for &whole/&environment in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp

### Implementation: Built-in Functions (FR-020 through FR-023)

- [ ] T065 [US4] Add hash-table functions to install-builtins in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
- [ ] T066 [P] [US4] Add sequence functions (mapcar, reduce, find, position, remove) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
- [ ] T067 [P] [US4] Add string functions (string=, upcase, downcase, concatenate) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
- [ ] T068 [P] [US4] Add numeric functions (floor, ceiling, truncate, round, mod, rem) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
- [ ] T069 [P] [US4] Add type functions (typep, type-of, coerce) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
- [ ] T070 [P] [US4] Add condition functions (error, warn, signal) in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp
- [ ] T071 [US4] Add remaining 50+ blessed functions in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-builtins.lisp

### Implementation: Standard Macro Expanders

- [ ] T072 [US4] Register when/unless macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T073 [P] [US4] Register and/or macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T074 [P] [US4] Register push/pop/incf/decf macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T075 [P] [US4] Register prog1/progn macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T076 [P] [US4] Register dolist/do macro expanders in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T077 [P] [US4] Register destructuring-bind macro expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T078 [P] [US4] Register setf macro expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp
- [ ] T079 [P] [US4] Register with-open-file macro expander in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-macros.lisp

**Checkpoint**: All special forms and macros available - US1 can now proceed

---

## Phase 4: User Story 1 - Run Compiler Source on Interpreter (Priority: P1)

**Goal**: Execute all 45 compiler modules via interpreter without errors

**Independent Test**: Load all modules via interpret-file and call compile-to-wasm on test expressions

### Tests for User Story 1 (TDD Required)

- [ ] T080 [P] [US1] Write file-loading-test.lisp in tests/unit/interpreter/file-loading-test.lisp
- [ ] T081 [P] [US1] Write compile-from-interpreter-test.lisp in tests/contract/interpreter-compile-test.lisp

### Implementation: File Loading (FR-024 through FR-027)

- [ ] T082 [US1] Implement interpret-file function in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
- [ ] T083 [US1] Implement filter-declare-forms helper in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
- [ ] T084 [US1] Implement with-open-file interpretation support in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
- [ ] T085 [US1] Implement package switching during file loading in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp

### Integration: Load Compiler Modules

- [ ] T086 [US1] Create load-compiler-modules function per *compilation-order* in src/clysm/eval/interpreter-file.lisp
- [ ] T087 [US1] Test loading backend modules (leb128, sections, wasm-emit) via interpreter in tests/integration/interpreter-backend-test.lisp
- [ ] T088 [US1] Test loading compiler modules (ast, env, codegen) via interpreter in tests/integration/interpreter-compiler-test.lisp
- [ ] T089 [US1] Test calling compile-to-wasm after interpreter load in tests/integration/interpreter-full-load-test.lisp

**Checkpoint**: Compiler source runs on interpreter - US2 can now proceed

---

## Phase 5: User Story 2 - Generate Stage 0 Binary via Interpreter (Priority: P2)

**Goal**: Generate valid Stage 0 Wasm binary entirely via interpreter evaluation

**Independent Test**: Run generate-stage0-via-interpreter and validate output with wasm-tools

### Tests for User Story 2 (TDD Required)

- [ ] T090 [P] [US2] Write stage0-generation-test.lisp in tests/contract/interpreter-stage0-test.lisp
- [ ] T091 [P] [US2] Write stage0-validation-test.lisp in tests/integration/stage0-wasm-valid-test.lisp

### Implementation: Bootstrap Infrastructure (FR-028 through FR-031)

- [ ] T092 [US2] Define bootstrap-result struct in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
- [ ] T093 [US2] Implement form-compilable-p predicate in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
- [ ] T094 [US2] Implement compile-single-form wrapper in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
- [ ] T095 [US2] Implement accumulate-wasm-bytes combiner in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
- [ ] T096 [US2] Implement generate-stage0-via-interpreter main function in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
- [ ] T097 [US2] Add progress tracking with module/form counts in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp
- [ ] T098 [US2] Add wasm-tools validate integration in src/clysm/bootstrap/interpreter-stage0.lisp

### Scripts and CLI

- [ ] T099 [US2] Create build/bootstrap-interp.lisp CLI entry point
- [ ] T100 [US2] Create scripts/gen-stage0-interp.sh shell wrapper

**Checkpoint**: Stage 0 generated via interpreter - US3 can now proceed

---

## Phase 6: User Story 3 - Achieve Fixed-Point Verification (Priority: P3)

**Goal**: Verify Stage 1 == Stage 2 byte-for-byte (proof of self-hosting)

**Independent Test**: Run verify-fixpoint.sh and check exit code 0

### Tests for User Story 3 (TDD Required)

- [ ] T101 [P] [US3] Write fixpoint-verification-test.lisp in tests/integration/bootstrap-fixpoint-test.lisp

### Implementation: Fixed-Point Infrastructure (FR-032 through FR-035)

- [ ] T102 [US3] Implement verify-fixpoint function in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp
- [ ] T103 [US3] Implement run-full-bootstrap (Stage 0 â†’ 1 â†’ 2) in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp
- [ ] T104 [US3] Implement generate-json-report for CI in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp
- [ ] T105 [US3] Define fixpoint-status type with exit codes in src/clysm/bootstrap/fixpoint.lisp

### Scripts and CLI

- [ ] T106 [US3] Create scripts/verify-fixpoint-interp.sh with exit codes
- [ ] T107 [US3] Create build/fixpoint-check.lisp CLI entry point
- [ ] T108 [US3] Integrate with existing scripts/verify-fixpoint.sh

**Checkpoint**: Fixed-point achieved - self-hosting proven

---

## Phase 7: User Story 5 - SBCL-Free Development Workflow (Priority: P4)

**Goal**: Complete development cycle without SBCL dependency

**Independent Test**: Run bootstrap-without-sbcl.sh and verify full cycle completes

### Tests for User Story 5 (TDD Required)

- [ ] T109 [P] [US5] Write sbcl-free-workflow-test.lisp in tests/integration/sbcl-free-test.lisp

### Implementation: Workflow Scripts

- [ ] T110 [US5] Create scripts/bootstrap-without-sbcl.sh that uses only wasmtime
- [ ] T111 [US5] Update host-shim/stage1-host.js to support interpreter-generated Stage 0
- [ ] T112 [US5] Create scripts/run-tests-via-interpreter.sh
- [ ] T113 [US5] Document SBCL-free workflow in docs/interpreter-bootstrap.md

**Checkpoint**: SBCL-free development possible

---

## Phase 8: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns

**Purpose**: Improvements that affect multiple user stories

- [ ] T114 [P] Update CLAUDE.md with interpreter bootstrap documentation
- [ ] T115 [P] Add interpreter tests to nix flake check
- [ ] T116 Code cleanup: Remove redundant host-CL delegations where possible
- [ ] T117 [P] Performance profiling: Ensure Stage 0 gen < 5 minutes
- [ ] T118 [P] Add interpreter-specific error messages with form context
- [ ] T119 Run quickstart.md validation end-to-end
- [ ] T120 Update specs/044-interpreter-bootstrap/checklists/requirements.md as complete

---

## Dependencies & Execution Order

### Phase Dependencies

```
Phase 1 (Setup)
    â†“
Phase 2 (Foundational) â† BLOCKS ALL USER STORIES
    â†“
Phase 3 (US4: Special Forms) â† BLOCKS US1
    â†“
Phase 4 (US1: Run Compiler) â† BLOCKS US2
    â†“
Phase 5 (US2: Stage 0 Gen) â† BLOCKS US3
    â†“
Phase 6 (US3: Fixed-Point)
    â†“
Phase 7 (US5: SBCL-Free) [Can run parallel with US3]
    â†“
Phase 8 (Polish)
```

### User Story Dependencies

- **US4 (P1)**: Must complete FIRST - provides all required special forms
- **US1 (P1)**: Depends on US4 - cannot load compiler without special forms
- **US2 (P2)**: Depends on US1 - cannot generate Stage 0 without loaded compiler
- **US3 (P3)**: Depends on US2 - cannot verify fixed-point without Stage 0
- **US5 (P4)**: Depends on US3 success - final workflow validation

### Parallel Opportunities Within Phases

**Phase 2 (Foundational):**
```
T007 (macro-registry)
T008, T009, T011, T012, T013 (all [P] - different structs)
T017, T018, T019, T020 (all [P] - different conditions)
```

**Phase 3 (US4):**
```
All test files T021-T028 are [P] - can write in parallel
Control flow forms T036-T040 are [P] - independent implementations
Condition forms T043-T048 are [P] - host delegation
Multiple value forms T050-T054 are [P] - independent
Builtin groups T065-T070 are [P] - different function categories
Macro expanders T073-T079 are [P] - independent macros
```

---

## Implementation Strategy

### MVP First (User Story 4 + 1 Only)

1. Complete Phase 1: Setup
2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational (CRITICAL)
3. Complete Phase 3: US4 (Special Forms)
4. Complete Phase 4: US1 (Run Compiler)
5. **STOP and VALIDATE**: All 45 modules load without error
6. Demo: `(compile-to-wasm '(+ 1 2))` returns valid Wasm

### Incremental Delivery

1. US4 + US1 â†’ Compiler runs on interpreter (MVP!)
2. Add US2 â†’ Stage 0 generation works
3. Add US3 â†’ Self-hosting proven
4. Add US5 â†’ Full SBCL-free workflow

### Task Count Summary

| Phase | Story | Task Count |
|-------|-------|------------|
| Setup | - | 6 |
| Foundational | - | 14 |
| US4: Special Forms | US4 | 59 |
| US1: Run Compiler | US1 | 10 |
| US2: Stage 0 Gen | US2 | 11 |
| US3: Fixed-Point | US3 | 8 |
| US5: SBCL-Free | US5 | 5 |
| Polish | - | 7 |
| **Total** | | **120** |

---

## Notes

- [P] tasks = different files, no dependencies, can run in parallel
- [US#] label maps task to specific user story
- TDD is mandatory per Constitution Principle VII
- All tests must FAIL before implementation
- Commit after each task or logical group
- US4 is technically P1 but implemented first since US1 depends on it

tasks.mdã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

**REMAINING: 120**
